page.alert: This feature has some Telegram bugs, sometimes the volume not is applied Client side
page.text: This method changes the output volume of the userbot using MTProto APIs.
page.syntax-highlight:
from pytgcalls import Client from pytgcalls import idle ...
app = PyTgCalls(client) app.start()
... # Call API methods
app.change_volume_call( -1001185324811, 175, )
idle()

subtext.text: Change the volume of the playing stream.
Volume to set to the stream
